email.subject: Overseas Vote: your login has been changed.
email.body_template:
Dear $!firstName,

While filling out your Register to Vote information, you entered an email address that was different from the email address that you entered before (that was used as your login for My Voter Account).

Your login has been updated and now it is $!newLogin. Your old login $!oldLogin will no longer work.

If there are any inaccuracies or mistakes, feel free to Contact us at any time.

Thank you for choosing the Overseas Vote site and services to register to vote and request your ballot for the upcoming $!year elections!

With sincere regards,

~ from the volunteer team at Overseas Vote

P.S. Please help: Overseas Vote is a nonprofit, nonpartisan 501(c)(3) public charity that depends on the giving gestures of voters such as you who use our voter services - to keep the foundation and services running for you and other voters like you. Please make your donation to OVF today.

Contact us at anytime with questions and comments
